dublin_core.dcvalue: Dr. Yogan Pillay Deputy Director- General HIV/AIDS, TB & MCHW pillay@health.gov.za
MomConnect aims to improve both the demand for MCH services, through providing pregnant women with information via messages, and the supply side through impacting on quality via user feedback.

USAID, Johnson & Johnson, Elma Philanthropies, Discovery Foundation

Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Provider-to-provider communication, Provider training and education, Child health, HIV/AIDS, Maternal health, Newborn heath
